participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, Emily enjoys expressing herself through vibrant hair colors and exploring local coffee shops with her loved ones.
participant_1.background: I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time. I'm almost finished with my degree. I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that. I am quite short, only five foot four. My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Determined and caring, Sophie is passionate about music and technology, striving to blend her interests while taking care of her family.
participant_2.background: I had to give up my job to take care of my health. I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch. I'm the lead singer for an indie band. I have a soft spot for stuffed animals, and I'd love to get one for my baby's nursery. I am a stay at home mom.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hey there! It's going great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm excited to be almost finished with my degree.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm studying business administration.
Cool! I had to give up my job to take care of my health, but I'm hoping to go back to school someday.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you get better soon!
Thank you! I'm doing much better now.
That's great to hear!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to color my hair bright colors and try new coffee shops with my husband.
That sounds fun! I like to sing in my indie band.
I love music! What kind of music do you sing?
We play a mix of rock, pop, and country.
That sounds cool! I love all of those genres.
We're actually pretty popular in our local area.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! We're actually planning on releasing our first album soon.
That's great! I'll be sure to check it out.
Thanks! I appreciate it!
No problem!
So, what's your favorite color?
My favorite color is blue.
Mine is too! It's such a calming color.
I know, right? It's my favorite color for clothes, too.
Me too! I have a lot of blue clothes.
Me too! We should be friends.
I think we should too!
Great! I'll send you a friend request.
Okay! I'll accept it!
